title: Seven key points from the SEC’s charges against Binance and Binance.US
description:
On June 5, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filed extensive charges against leading cryptocurrency exchange Binance and related parties, alleging securities law violations. The filing represents one of the most comprehensive sets of charges filed by the SEC against a cryptocurrency company to date. Below are the most important allegations and facts. 1. […]
